verses.esv: 16 But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the flesh.
verses.kjv: 16 This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
verses.niv: 16 So I say, live by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the sinful nature.

verses.esv: 7 But the LORD said to Samuel, “Do not look on his appearance or on the height of his stature, because I have rejected him. For the LORD sees not as man sees: man looks on the outward appearance, but the LORD looks on the heart.”
verses.kjv: 7 But the LORD said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the LORD seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the LORD looketh on the heart.
verses.niv: 7 But the LORD said to Samuel, "Do not consider his appearance or his height, for I have rejected him. The LORD does not look at the things man looks at. Man looks at the outward appearance, but the LORD looks at the heart."

verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.

verses.esv: 13 No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tempted beyond your ability, but with the temptation he will also provide the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.
verses.kjv: 13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
verses.niv: 13 No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv:
28   A man without self-control
    is like a city broken into and left without walls.
verses.kjv: 28 He that hath no rule over his own spirit is like a city that is broken down, and without walls.
verses.niv: 28 Like a city whose walls are broken down is a man who lacks self-control.

verses.esv:
5   I acknowledged my sin to you,
    and I did not cover my iniquity;
  I said, “I will confess my transgressions to the LORD,”
    and you forgave the iniquity of my sin. Selah
verses.kjv: 5 I acknowledged my sin unto thee, and mine iniquity have I not hid. I said, I will confess my transgressions unto the LORD; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin. Selah.
verses.niv: 5 Then I acknowledged my sin to you and did not cover up my iniquity. I said, "I will confess my transgressions to the LORD "- and you forgave the guilt of my sin. Selah

verses.esv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow due to change.
verses.kjv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
verses.niv: 17 Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows.

verses.esv: 17 So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
verses.kjv: 17 So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
verses.niv: 17 Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 9 You, however, are not in the flesh but in the Spirit, if in fact the Spirit of God dwells in you. Anyone who does not have the Spirit of Christ does not belong to him.
verses.kjv: 9 But ye are not in the flesh, but in the Spirit, if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you. Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his.
verses.niv: 9 You, however, are controlled not by the sinful nature but by the Spirit, if the Spirit of God lives in you. And if anyone does not have the Spirit of Christ, he does not belong to Christ.

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv:
18   Come, let us take our fill of love till morning;
    let us delight ourselves with love.
verses.kjv: 18 Come, let us take our fill of love until the morning: let us solace ourselves with loves.
verses.niv: 18 Come, let's drink deep of love till morning; let's enjoy ourselves with love!

verses.esv:
Nun

105   Your word is a lamp to my feet
    and a light to my path.
verses.kjv: 105 Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
verses.niv: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light for my path.
